edatoolsmkh 0.0.0.9000

    Introduction to edatools – mkh version

    edatoolsmkh.Rmd

    The edatoolsmkh package is a demonstration project for learning how to build an R package. It comes from Chapter 22 of R in Action (3rd ed).

    The package has one main function for describing a data frame and two generic functions.

    library(edatoolsmkh)
    df_info <- contents(happiness)
print(df_info, digits = 4)
#> Data frame: happiness 
#> 460 observations and 11 variables
#> size: 0.1 Mb 
#>  pos   varname      type n_unique n_miss pct_miss
#>    1       ID* character      460      0  0.00000
#>    2      Date      Date       12      0  0.00000
#>    3       Sex    factor        2      0  0.00000
#>    4      Race    factor        8     92  0.20000
#>    5       Age   integer       73     46  0.10000
#>    6 Education    factor       13     23  0.05000
#>    7    Income   numeric      415     46  0.10000
#>    8        IQ   numeric       45    322  0.70000
#>    9       Zip character       10      0  0.00000
#>   10  Children   integer       11      0  0.00000
#>   11     Happy   ordered        6     18  0.03913
plot(df_info)
